articles.author: Capital Market
articles.title: Tata Power Company Ltd up for third straight session - Business Standard
articles.description: Tata Power Company Ltd is quoting at Rs 155.9, up 2.84% on the day as on 12:54 IST on the NSE. The stock is up 186.32% in last one year as compared to a 54.81% jump in NIFTY and a 51.13% jump in the Nifty Energy index.
